docs.title: TeSLA CE Python Client
docs.text: :warning: This repository is under construction. Final release of TeSLA Community Edition source code is expected by the end of 2021

docs.title: config property
docs.text: Get current module configuration :return: Module configuration :rtype: dict

docs.title: module property
docs.text: Get current module information :return: Module information :rtype: dict

docs.title: provider property
docs.text: Access to the Provider related methods :return: Provider controller object :rtype: ProviderClient

docs.title: v1 property
docs.text: Access to the old API v1 methods :return: Old API v1 controller object :rtype: ClientV1

docs.title: vle property
docs.text: Access to the VLE related methods :return: VLE controller object :rtype: VleClient

docs.title: get_next(list)
docs.text: Get the next group of results from a list :param list: List of results :type list: dict :return: Next group of results :rtype: dict

docs.title: get_previous(list)
docs.text: Get the previous group of results from a list :param list: List of results :type list: dict :return: Previous group of results :rtype: dict
